sentences.english: Sunday's stalemate at Wigan was Arsenal's third Premier League draw on a row.

sentences.english: After the two draws we wanted to show just what we can do when we put our minds to it.
sentences.chinese: 兩連平之後，我們有着證明自己的強烈渴望。

sentences.english: The quartz vein type gold deposits are well developed in middle Rushan region, Shandong.
sentences.chinese: 粵北連平地區鎢錫多金屬礦牀類型主要爲石英脈型。
